ivardefs.name: basis_
ivardefs.desc: The legal framework against which this authorization is granted, or other reasons for it.

ivardefs.name: case
ivardefs.desc: The case or regulatory procedure for granting or amending a marketing authorization.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifier for the marketing authorization, as assigned by a regulator.

ivardefs.name: jurisdictionalAuthorization_
ivardefs.desc: Authorization in areas within a country.

ivardefs.name: region_
ivardefs.desc: The region (country, jurisdiction etc.) in which the marketing authorization has been granted.

ivardefs.name: relatedDate_
ivardefs.desc: Other dates associated with the authorization. It is common for an authorization to have renewal dates, initial time limited phases and so on.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the marketing authorization.

ivardefs.name: statusDate
ivardefs.desc: The date at which the given status has become applicable.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The product that is being authorized.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Type of this authorization, for example drug marketing approval, orphan drug designation.

ivardefs.name: validityPeriod
ivardefs.desc: The beginning of the time period in which the marketing authorization is in the specific status shall be specified A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format.

properties.desc: The regulatory authorization of a medicinal product.
